pullRequest.title: FINERACT-838 TravisCI Setup | Updated swagger-codegen-cli version
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description

Updated the swagger-codegen-cli version to 3.0.18 since all greater versions throw Missing OpenApi File error. swagger-api/swagger-codegen#10157 . (A bug in swagger-codegen-cli)
Fixed Base URL in fineract-input.yml for Swagger Codegen since build for generated code was failing due to incorrect Base URL.
Added "Generate and Build" commands in .travis.yml

Checklist
Please make sure these boxes are checked before submitting your pull request - thanks!


 Commit message starts with the issue number from https://issues.apache.org/jira/projects/FINERACT/. Ex: FINERACT-646 Pockets API.


 Coding conventions at https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/FINERACT/Coding+Conventions have been followed.


 API documentation at fineract-provider/src/main/resources/static/api-docs/apiLive.htm has been updated with details of any API changes.


 Integration tests have been created/updated for verifying the changes made.


 All Integrations tests are passing with the new commits.


 Submission is not a "code dump".  (Large changes can be made "in repository" via a branch.  Ask on the list.)


Our guidelines for code reviews is at https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/FINERACT/Code+Review+Guide

commit.message: FINERACT-838 Fixed Base URL for Swagger Codegen
Merge branch 'develop' of https://github.com/apache/fineract into swagger-codegen
FINERACT-838 Travis CI setup for Swagger Codegen

nodes.bodyText:
This currently appears to be down? But even if it was up, I would much prefer this to use fineract.dev instead:

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            - url: https://demo.openmf.org/fineract-provider/api/v1
          
          
            
            - url: https://demo.fineract.dev/fineract-provider/api/v1
          
      
    
    
  

@Grandolf49 see https://www.fineract.dev for background... OK for you?
